sentence.Network_en: If so, he would at any rate be able to deliver the cockchafer speech.
sentence.Network_cn: 若是那样, 他无论如何也要把那一番骂人的话发泄出来.

sentence.Network_en: Left with nothing to say, Dixon realized how wild a notion the cockchafer speech had been.
sentence.Network_cn: 狄克逊感到无话可说, 同时意识到那个想骂人的念头是多么不切合实际.

sentence.Network_en: Suddenly a GREat cockchafer buzzed along . Alas!
sentence.Network_cn: 突然一只很大的金龟子 嗡 嗡嗡飞过.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1869年,又发生了英皇家军舰金龟子(Cockchafer)号事件,英人称该军舰从潮州沿韩江而上时,船上人员无故遭当地村民袭击,几人受重伤。英领事阿查礼请香港英国海军上将.
人工抹卵(egg):玉米螟,斜纹夜蛾; 捏杀幼虫(larvae):番茄棉铃虫; 震落捕杀:金龟甲(cockchafer)等的假死性; 铁丝钩杀蛀入树干内的天牛幼虫摘除虫果冬季或.

list.abs: a summary on cockchafer in fujian ., 福建松针金龟概述.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from cock (expressing size or vigour) + chafer

means.word_mean: 1. any of various large European beetles destructive to vegetation as both larvae and adult
